title: Gonna Build a Kingdom

tokens.lyric: Gonna build a kingdom on this sad old ground;

lines.raw: [C]Gonna build a kingdom on this sad old ground;

tokens.lyric: Gonna build a kingdom all around!
Gonna call it heaven 'cause that's what it'll be--

lines.raw: [C]Gonna call it heaven 'cause that's what it'll be--

tokens.lyric: A place of beauty, peace and joy for you and me!

lines.raw: [F]A place of beauty, peace and joy for you and me!

tokens.lyric: It'll take some hard work to make this old mud new.

lines.raw: [C]It'll take some hard work to make this old mud new.

tokens.lyric: It'll take a struggle, but we'll see it through!

lines.raw: [G7]It'll take a struggle, but we'll see it through!

tokens.lyric: Go and tell your friends if they want to come,

lines.raw: [C]Go and tell your friends if they want to come,

tokens.lyric: That they're all welcome to this land we call freedom!

lines.raw: [F]That they're all welcome to this land we call freedom!

tokens.lyric: Fight determined to be victors and we'll triumph in the end.

lines.raw: [F]Fight determined to be victors and we'll triumph in the end.

tokens.lyric: And we'll stop this world of trouble, and we'll ease this pain for men.

lines.raw: [G]And we'll stop this world of trouble, and we'll ease this pain for men.

tokens.lyric: We've a kingdom to establish with our tears, our sweat, our blood;

lines.raw: [C]We've a kingdom to establish with our tears, our sweat, our blood;

tokens.lyric: And we'll kick to hell this world of hell

lines.raw: [Am]And we'll kick to hell this world of hell

tokens.lyric: And build a new world for God!

lines.raw: [G7]And build a new world for God!

tokens.lyric: So come all you people, it's your kingdom too;

lines.raw: [C]So come all you people, it's your kingdom too;

tokens.lyric: 'Cause it won't be a kingdom without you.

lines.raw: [G7]'Cause it won't be a kingdom without you.

tokens.lyric: So rejoice my brothers, all men of all lands;

lines.raw: [C]So rejoice my brothers, all men of all lands;

tokens.lyric: For the glory of the true world — that wonderful me and you world--

lines.raw: [F]For the glory of the true world — that wonderful me and you world--

tokens.lyric: The kingdom of the new world is at hand!

lines.raw: [G7]The kingdom of the new world is at hand!
